dict.string: Control Radium via Alfred. Chocolatey goodness :-)

cat << EOB
<?xml version="1.0"?>
<items>
<item uid="radium.play" autocomplete="play" arg="play"> <title>Play</title> <subtitle>Play/resume the currently-selected station</subtitle> <icon>icon.png</icon> </item>
<item uid="radium.pause" autocomplete="pause" arg="pause"> <title>Pause</title> <subtitle>Pause playback</subtitle> <icon>icon.png</icon> </item>
<item uid="radium.playpause" autocomplete="playpause" arg="playpause"> <title>Play/Pause</title> <subtitle>Toggle Radium's playing/paused state</subtitle> <icon>icon.png</icon> </item>
<item uid="radium.stop" autocomplete="stop" arg="stop"> <title>Stop</title> <subtitle>Stop playback and disconnect from station</subtitle> <icon>icon.png</icon> </item>
<item uid="radium.quit" autocomplete="quit" arg="quit"> <title>Quit</title> <subtitle>Quits Radium</subtitle> <icon>icon.png</icon> </item>
</items>
EOB

tell application "System Events" set radiumIsUp to Â¬ (count of (every process whose name is "Radium")) > 0 end tell if radiumIsUp is false then tell application "Radium" activate end tell do shell script "sleep 5" end if tell application "Radium" {query} end tell
